Description: Each time you <color=#0F70BC>switch characters</color>, gain 1 Energy (max <color=#0F70BC>3 stacks</color>). Spend <color=#0F70BC>3 Energy</color> to enter <color=#0F70BC>Matrix</color>, gaining <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> Extra DMG Bonus and <color=#0F70BC>1 random Signal Orb each second</color> within <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: ·Gain <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> Extra DMG Bonus\n·Duration: <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>

Description: Passive Effect: Whenever <color=#0F70BC>1 character</color> dies in this mode, increase HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> Max HP (does not apply in Classical Showdown)\nUse to decrease the enemy's Extra DMG by <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> for <color=#0F70BC>8s</color>. While in effect, if an enemy is <color=#0F70BC>defeated</color>, recover <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> of Max HP\nCD: <color=#0F70BC>25s</color>
UpgradeDescription: ·After defeating an enemy, take <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> reduced DMG for <color=#0F70BC>8s</color>\n·Meeting the requirements recovers <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> HP

Description:
Passive Effect: Upon entering combat, recover <color=#0F70BC>20% of lost HP</color>
Upon use, reduce <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Max HP to become invincible for <color=#0F70BC>2s</color> and gain <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for <color=#0F70BC>5s</color>
Cooldown: <color=#0F70BC>15s</color>
Each use will increase its HP reduction by 2x, but it <color=#0F70BC>will not be fatal</color>.
UpgradeDescription: ·Upon entering battle, recover <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> of missing HP\n·Gain <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Extra DMG Bonus

Description: Passive Effect: After entering battle, recover HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>5% Max HP</color>\nAutomatically obtain <color=#0F70BC>2</color> Energy; <color=#0F70BC>1</color> additional Energy for each Basic Attack; and <color=#0F70BC>3</color> Energy for each 1-ping (max <color=#0F70BC>100</color> Energy)\nYou can activate once Energy reaches the limit. Once activated, <color=#0F70BC>all of your orbs</color> with be replaced with <color=#0F70BC>3 sets of Signal Orbs</color> for <color=#0F70BC>2s</color>. Orbs will be replaced based on the number of orbs used to activate skills.
UpgradeDescription: ·Upon entering the battle, recover <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> Max HP\n·Extra Signal Orbs last <color=#0F70BC>2s</color>

Description:
Restores <color=#0F70BC>6%</color> of Max HP upon casting it.
Gathers Energy and keeps pulling enemies around for <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>
When pulling the enemies, the character will be immune to damage with no attack or movement restrictions.
Skill cooldown is <color=#0F70BC>120s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: - HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>6%</color> of Max HP will be restored.\n- The effect will last <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>.

Description:
The character generates a <color=#0F70BC>0.8-second</color> shield upon casing it.
Upon receiving damage from an enemy, the shield will <color=#0F70BC>resist damage once</color>
When the shield successfully resists the damage, Matrix will be triggered and the character will receive <color=#0F70BC>1</color> random Signal Orb.
Meanwhile, the character will counterattack the target and deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> of current HP.
The counterattack deals <color=#0F70BC>100%</color> more DMG if the target's HP is below <color=#0F70BC>50%</color>.
Skill cooldown is <color=#0F70BC>30s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: - Gains <color=#0F70BC>1</color> random Signal Orb.\nReflects DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> of the target's current HP
